about_the_game:
Play as Vera, the young Shadow Empress of Bilon - a direct aide to the Empress (your sister) who not only stole your fiance, but left you doing the taxes as well! You’re no push-over though: Fed up, you infiltrated the Harem of the Immortals - and will take your revenge by winning over the five male, magical creatures who reside there.

Vackon Durai


“I’ve tortured bodies and souls alike - often out of duty. But your soul, I’d eat it whole - for the pleasure alone.”

Sairen Elilarashu


“People are more inclined to give you anything through pleasure than pain. Oh, don’t get me wrong, little jellyfish. A little pain is always welcome ♥♪”

Features


  • 5 Love Interests
  • Animated CGs
  • Multiple Endings
  • Secret Ending - Will you win over all the Love interests and unlock the true ending?

Get a taste




Content is being added as we go - first we will introduce you to two of the five Love Interests (Vackon and Sairen). Eventually, you will be able to meet the Priests of the Sacred Snake Temple, the winged and playful God of Love - and explore character combinations as well.

Will you step into the Harem?




Wishlist us and try the demo

content_descriptors.notes: Seduce her Harem contains mature themes and is intended for a mature audience. Player discretion is advised. Specific warnings for this demo include but are not limited to: unwanted advances, alcohol, strong language.

name: Seduce her Harem

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Anything after 2016
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything after 2016
  • Storage: 496 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard card is fine

dejus.descriptors:
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas lícitas
Conteúdo sexual

short_description: Play as Vera, the young Shadow Empress in this choice-driven Dating Sim Visual Novel. Enter the residence of the five mythical men of this reverse harem!
